alert.note: Alert for Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 02 at 3:39PM HST until December 03 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 AM SATURDAY... .The current large, long period west northwest swell (300-310 degrees) will continue to slowly subside through tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Surf 12 to 16 feet. * WHERE...North shores of Windward Haleakala. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
